entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning late this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
